name: Jinx (Project Revival Jam 2)
description:
This is a submission to the Project Revival Jam 2 game jam, using the optional theme modifiers "Cadaver Pit" (using assets from Asset Pack Jam), and "Franken Combination" (Fuse multiple dead projects in some capacity).

I wanted to make a game in memory of my blind granny cat, Jinx, who was 22 when she crossed the rainbow bridge.

I also wanted to make a game about Charon, the ferryman of the dead.

This game takes place immediately after Jinx crossed the rainbow bridge in December 2021, and it is a depiction of what she does afterwards with Charon (who in this, is called "Grim Reaper"). There are two ending endings, and three ways to get them.

Thank you very much for looking at this game, and I hope you enjoy being Jinx and hearing about her as much as I enjoyed having her in my life for 22 years.

Assets used from 'Asset Pack Jam':

Gromb Doll Assets by Thatkalish

Palette Shader 2 by Greenf0x

Melodic Autumn - Free Music Pack by Blue Lava

Other assets:

Background images found on PxHere

Voice Changer io for the Grim Reaper voice distortions
